name: Adiri
description: Its former power long since worn down by war, the Human-founded city-state of Adiri remains stubbornly independent from the united lands surrounding it. Here still the long tradition of champion warfare is practiced, augmented now by the Iliyanites’ metal-shaping, which also fills the city’s bazaars with one-of-a-kind armaments. Public displays of combative skill are the centerpiece of life in the city, and those who still remember the former aspirational glory of the Adirian Empire begin to look at neighboring lands with hungry eyes…
names: Bakari, Asha, Jabari, Nia, Idrissa, Zuberi, Malika, Ayodele, Tariq, Imani, Sekou, Halima, Nuru, Kofi, Adama, Salif, Zara, Amadou, Kenza, Faizah
